creator: Koto
descriptionHtml:
We are here to challenge the way you manage your money through our koto stress-free credit and mobile money app.

Key Features

- Mobile money - Koto Account
- Use Google Pay straight away
- Wherever you see the Mastercard sign
- No fees for using your card abroad

Manage everything with Koto mobile app:
- Set up Direct Debits, Standing Orders and Money Transfers in your app
- Get real-time alerts on your spend
- Pay people instantly
- Top up your account instantly
- Manage your monthly budget, tracking where you are spending your money

Mobile credit access to two different forms of credit Koto Extra facility or Koto Spread facility:
- Koto Extra - Extra credit when you need it
- Koto Spread - spread larger purchases to manage your budget

Subject to status, terms and conditions apply. Please go to www.getkoto.com for further information.

What you need to have with you when applying: Driving license or Passport

You will need to enable notifications in the mobile app to receive alerts.

If you have any questions or problems during the application process contact us in the app using chat.

Koto Card Limited is authorized and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority.
descriptionShort: Koto – bringing you a new way of managing your money!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. We've improved the payment names and removed the in-app error messages
2. You will now be able to add your phone number in without seeing the “0”
3. We've fixed the name for plastic cards
4. We are now able to determine the country of each applicant by their IP address in order to increase customer's protection from fraud

title: Koto card

creator: Koto
descriptionHtml:
Build your credit score with koto. Your account lets you use credit or your own money, all in one. We are here to challenge the way you manage your money through our credit and mobile money app. If you are not eligible for credit yet, we’ll give you a mobile payment account until you are.

Key Features 🚀
- Two credit features in one product
- App-based current account to manage your money
- Improve your credit score by making your payments on time

Manage everything with the Koto mobile app ✅
- Set up direct debits, standing orders, and money transfers in your app;
- Transfer money with faster payments to and from UK bank accounts;
- Spend anywhere you see the Mastercard logo - you can use koto to pay for your purchases nearly everywhere;
- Add your koto card to your Google Pay wallet to pay by phone or smart watch;
- Get real-time alerts on your spend;
- Pay people instantly;
- Top up your account instantly;
- Shake your phone for p2p transfers between koto users;
- Manage your monthly budget, tracking where you are spending your money so you can stay in control of your finances;
- Fixed fees for koto credit mean you can stay on top of the costs - no more complicated accounting to understand your monthly payments;
- No fees for using your own money in ATMs or abroad.

Two different forms of credit in one product ⭐️

1) Koto Extra - spend over your balance when you need to
Assumed Credit Amount: £500
Fixed charge: £0.20 per day
Representative APR: 29.2% variable

2) Koto Spread - spread larger purchases to manage your budget
Assumed Credit Amount: £1000
Fixed charge: £10 per month
Representative APR: 23.7% variable

Credit subject to status, 18 and over, UK only. E-money accounts are not covered by the FSCS. Please go to www.getkoto.com for further information.

You will need to enable notifications in the mobile app to receive alerts.

If you have any questions or problems during the application process contact us in the app using chat.
Koto Card Limited is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority to perform regulated Consumer Credit activities (FRN 813940) and is an appointed eMoney agent of Prepay Technologies Ltd (FRN900010).
Koto Card Limited is a company registered in England and Wales (No. 11224081) at Nightingale House, 46-48 East Street, Epsom, Surrey, England KT17 1HQ.
descriptionShort: Money management. Money transfer, improve your credit score, use virtual wallets

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We’ve made some improvements to the application for koto to make it even easier to enjoy.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We've launched our brand new app! Koto is now The Credit Thing

title: Koto: credit & debit card app

creator: Koto
descriptionHtml:
A new approach to credit cards - credit at your fingertips. Build your credit score with The Credit Thing. An app you’ll want to use every day. If you are not eligible for credit yet, we’ll give you a mobile payment account until you are.

Key Features
• Risk-free eligibility check,
• Up to 62 days interest-free,
• Apply on your mobile,
• Instant virtual card,
• Improve your credit score by using The Credit Thing and making payments on time.

The Credit Thing is for anyone who wants to try something new:
• You want to build or improve your credit record,
• You are new to credit or new to the UK,
• You are bored of the same big banks, long forms and slow answers,
• You value innovation, convenience and transparency.
You must be over 18 and resident in the UK to apply. Credit is subject to status.

Representative Example:
Assumed credit limit: £1200,
Interest on Purchases: 27.9% (variable)
Representative APR: 27.9% (variable)
Annual fee: None

✅ Add The Credit Thing to your Google Pay then use contactless in store - it’s accepted wherever you see the Mastercard logo
💳 View your card details in-app and use them to spend online
💷 Transfer money with faster payments to and from UK bank accounts
💬 Get real-time alerts on your spend
📲 Make payments in the app
✈️ No additional fees for using your card abroad

E-money accounts are not covered by the FSCS. Please go to www.thecreditthing.com for further information.
You will need to enable notifications in the mobile app to receive alerts.
If you have any questions or problems during the application process contact us in the app using chat.
The Credit Thing is a trading name of Koto Card Limited. Koto Card Limited is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority to perform regulated Consumer Credit activities (FRN 813940) and is an appointed eMoney agent of Prepay Technologies Ltd (FRN900010).
Koto Card Limited is a company registered in England and Wales (No. 11224081) at Nightingale House, 46-48 East Street, Epsom, Surrey, England KT17 1HQ.

title: The Credit Thing

creator: Koto
descriptionHtml:
A new approach to credit cards - credit at your fingertips. Build your credit score with The Credit Thing. An app you’ll want to use every day. If you are not eligible for credit yet, we’ll give you a mobile payment account until you are.

Key Features
• Risk-free eligibility check,
• Up to 62 days interest-free,
• Apply on your mobile,
• Instant virtual card,
• Improve your credit score by using The Credit Thing and making payments on time.

The Credit Thing is for anyone who wants to try something new:
• You want to build or improve your credit record,
• You are new to credit or new to the UK,
• You are bored of the same big banks, long forms and slow answers,
• You value innovation, convenience and transparency.
You must be over 18 and resident in the UK to apply. Credit is subject to status.

Representative Example:
Assumed credit limit: £1200,
Interest on Purchases: 27.9% (variable)
Representative APR: 27.9% (variable)
Annual fee: None

✅ Add The Credit Thing to your Google Pay then use contactless in store - it’s accepted wherever you see the Mastercard logo
💳 View your card details in-app and use them to spend online
💷 Transfer money with faster payments to and from UK bank accounts
💬 Get real-time alerts on your spend
📲 Make payments in the app
✈️ No additional fees for using your card abroad

E-money accounts are not covered by the FSCS. Please go to www.thecreditthing.com for further information.
You will need to enable notifications in the mobile app to receive alerts.

• Risk-free eligibility check,
• Up to 62 days interest-free,
• Apply on your mobile,
• Instant virtual card,
• Improve your credit score by using The Credit Thing and making payments on time.

The Credit Thing is for anyone who wants to try something new:
• You want to build or improve your credit record,
• You are new to credit or new to the UK,
• You are bored of the same big banks, long forms and slow answers,
• You value innovation, convenience and transparency.
You must be over 18 and resident in the UK to apply. Credit is subject to status.

Representative Example:
Assumed credit limit: £1200,
Interest on Purchases: 27.9% (variable)
Representative APR: 27.9% (variable)
Annual fee: None

✅ Add The Credit Thing to your Google Pay then use contactless in store - it’s accepted wherever you see the Mastercard logo
💳 View your card details in-app and use them to spend online
💷 Transfer money with faster payments to and from UK bank accounts
💬 Get real-time alerts on your spend
📲 Make payments in the app
✈️ No additional fees for using your card abroad

E-money accounts are not covered by the FSCS. Please go to www.thecreditthing.com for further information.
You will need to enable notifications in the mobile app to receive alerts.
If you have any questions or problems during the application process contact us in the app using chat.

title: The Credit Thing

creator: Koto Card Limited
descriptionHtml:
A new approach to credit cards - credit at your fingertips. Build your credit score with The Credit Thing. An app you’ll want to use every day.

Key Features
• Risk-free eligibility check,
• Up to 62 days interest-free,
• Apply on your mobile,
• Instant virtual card,
• Improve your credit score by using The Credit Thing and making payments on time.

🔄 You can also set up a regular payment to pay your bill each month - no need to worry about forgetting! Choose the card, what and when you want to pay, we’ll take care of the rest.

The Credit Thing is for anyone who wants to try something new:
• You want to build or improve your credit record,
• You are new to credit or new to the UK,
• You are bored of the same big banks, long forms and slow answers,
• You value innovation, convenience and transparency.
You must be over 18 and resident in the UK to apply. Credit is subject to status.

Representative Example:
Assumed credit limit: £1200,
Interest on Purchases: 27.9% (variable)

Annual fee: None

💬 Get real-time alerts on your spend
📲 Make payments in the app
✈️ No additional fees for using your card abroad

descriptionHtml:
Open an account with The Credit Thing and use it with your own money for free, no hidden fees. This is an app you’ll want to use every day.

Key Features
• Instant virtual card
• Simple account opening
• Free money transfer

The Credit Thing is for anyone who wants to try something new:
- You are new to the UK or want to try something different
- You want a change from the same big banks,
- You value innovation, convenience and transparency
- You prefer to talk with human customer service
- You are over 18 and a UK resident

With The Credit Thing you can:
✅ Add The Credit Thing to your Google Pay then use contactless in store - it’s accepted wherever you see the Mastercard logo
💳 View your card details in-app and use them to spend online
💬 Get real-time alerts on your spending.
📲 Make payments in the app.
✈️ No additional fees for using your card abroad
💷 🇬🇧 Faster payments to and from UK bank accounts

E-money accounts are not covered by the FSCS. Please go to https://thecreditthing.com/ for further information.
You will need to enable notifications in the mobile app to receive alerts.
If you have any questions or problems during the application process contact us in the app using chat.
